articles.title: Morgan Wallen makes big announcement on rescheduled tour dates - Fox News
articles.description: Country star Morgan Wallen has rescheduled several dates of his "One Night at a Time" tour that he was forced to cancel when he found out he had injured his vocal cords.
articles.content:
Morgan Wallen has announced new tour dates just days after he canceled six weeks of shows after getting "bad news" from his doctor that he had injured his vocal cords.

articles.title: Filipino American Muppet on 'Sesame Street' makes debut - USA TODAY
articles.description: The Filipino American Muppet on Sesame Street, TJ, said he is learning his family's language and can always ask his lola – grandma – for help.
articles.content:
There's a new Muppet on Sesame Street and for the first time, the cute, cuddly character is of Filipino descent.
